list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: join together (metal pieces or parts) by heating the surfaces to the point of melting using a blowtorch, electric arc, or other means, and uniting them by pressing, hammering, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the truck had spikes welded to the back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe tải có gai được hàn vào lưng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause to combine and form a harmonious or effective whole.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his efforts to weld together the religious parties ran into trouble
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những nỗ lực của ông để liên kết với nhau các bên tôn giáo gặp rắc rối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a widely distributed plant related to mignonette, yielding a yellow dye.
